msbt.message: Yo, !<10_4 /> What's this I hear about you having some kind ofspecial project?
Yo, !<10_4 /> What's this I hear about you having some kind ofspecial project?

I was hoping you might be producing a low budget, yet artistically groundbreaking feature film And so I dropped everything to get my headshots updated!Then I found out you've been working behind the scenes to get K.K. a gig on ! That's even cooler, !
Kudos to you. You clearly take this whole resident-representative thing pretty seriously.

Of course, awesomeness of your caliber deserves more than a mere round of applause. Oh! I haven't had a chance to get you a present or anythingWhich works out because it looks like your hands are full as it is.For now, I hope my heartfelt gratitude and general awe will suffice, .
In fact, your dedication inspired me to get something for YOU!
Recognize this? They call it .I think it might come in handy for that special project Wink, wink!Now I leave the rest in your capable hands, .
Still working on bringing us that K.K. concert, ?<10_4 /> That's showbiz for ya. Well, I admire your persistence!

Of course, awesomeness of your caliber deserves more than a mere round of applause. Oh! I haven't had a chance to get you a present or anythingWhich works out because it looks like your hands are full as it is.For now, I hope my heartfelt gratitude and general awe will suffice, .
In fact, your dedication inspired me to get something for YOU!
In fact, your dedication inspired me to get something for YOU!
Recognize this? They call it .I think it might come in handy for that special project Wink, wink!Now I leave the rest in your capable hands, .
You may have seen this before. It's And let's just say it wasn't easy to procure. I'm thinking it might be useful for that project of yours. You'll see what I mean, eventually

Know what this is? It's a recipe for something I call . It's no big deal, but I literally put my heart and soul into designing this for you, . But please don't take that into account when you decide whether or not to decorate the island with it!
